name: SPACENESS (Asul)
description:
SPACENESS its a space shooter game made for KoriJam!

"Alone in the vast space, you must protect your base and yourself  for the most waves that you can!"

Controls: (Keyboard)

A/D = Rotate your nave.
W = Move Forward.

SPACE = Shoot.

E = Shield.

TAB = Upgrades screen.

ESC = Pause.

ENTER = Confirm.

Controls: (Gamepad) "xbox controller"

Left Stick = Rotate your nave.
LT = Move Forward.

RT = Shoot.

X = Shield.

START = Pause.

SELECT = Upgrades Screen.

A = Confirm.
